## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7ffc4fb420d4b6a7508fa65da3a3695af74f01732f92bf8a4beaac80d16c1985)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'show-dependencies' @ 99.9.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
